title: List of Juventus FC managers - Wikipedia
snippet: The most successful person to manage Juventus is Giovanni Trapattoni, who won six Football League titles (Scudetto), two Coppa Italias, one European Champions Clubs' Cup, one UEFA Cup Winners' Cup, two UEFA Cups, one UEFA Super Cup and one Intercontinental Cup in two periods from 1976 and 1986 ...
